title: Learn to Fly and Understand the Technology
description: Start with an affordable, entry-level drone to learn the basics of flight control, orientation, and safety. Immerse yourself in the technology: understand how GPS, gyroscopes, and flight controllers work.

title: Obtain CAASL Certification
description: To operate drones commercially in Sri Lanka, you must be certified by the Civil Aviation Authority of Sri Lanka (CAASL). This involves passing a written exam and a practical flight test. This is a mandatory step for any professional work.
skills: Knowledge of Sri Lankan air regulations

title: Specialize and Build a Portfolio
description: Choose a specialization. The most common are aerial cinematography/photography and industrial surveying/mapping. Invest in a professional-grade drone suited for your niche and build a strong portfolio (showreel) of your best work.
qualifications: A professional showreel or portfolio of work
institutes: Freelance work for real estate, events, or small production houses

title: Professional Drone Pilot / Service Provider
description: Work as a full-time professional pilot. You may work for a production house, a surveying company, or run your own freelance business offering drone services to various industries like construction, agriculture, and media.

title: Advanced Applications and Business Scaling
description: Scale your business by offering more advanced services, such as thermal imaging, LiDAR scanning, or heavy-lift drone operations. This may involve hiring other pilots and building a larger drone services company.
qualifications: Expertise in advanced drone payloads and applications
